zenprice.priceNotFixed: This item does not have a fixed price
text.autoconfig.Zenprice/config.title: Zenprice config
text.autoconfig.Zenprice/config.option.s: Enable the mod only when connected to Zencraft
text.autoconfig.Zenprice/config.option.e: Enable automatic update of the Excel file (Disable if you use a customized Excel file)
text.autoconfig.Zenprice/config.option.p: Text before the price under the items
Allows modifying the text that appears before the price under the items
text.autoconfig.Zenprice/config.option.c: Text before the price on the chests names
Allows modifying the text that appears on the chests names
